component.name: 1. ism/isps/qem - general observations
component.findings:
non conformity: bridge standing order for ecdis is misleading and not properly understood by oows.

recommended corrective measures: standing order to be revised and discussed with oows.
component.reporttext:
sms, security system, ohsas and qem-system of hapag-lloyd are well implemented. procedures are continuously observed and maintained by shipboard management and crew. on-signing crewmember have been familiarised, respective familiarisation-documents have been controlled by auditor. the ssa and ssp have been reviewed and found to be adequate.

during the internal audit below non-conformities/ observations related to the sms/sec-system/qems has/have been noticed, see 'results of internal audit' enclosed. listed corrective measures/improvements have to be implemented, reported and confirmed within the given time-period. the implementation of corrective actions based on results of previous audits has been verified.

component.name: 2. ism/isps/qem - results of internal audit
component.guidance: safety management system (sms), security system according to isps, occupational health and safety system (ohsas) acc. to german law and quality and environmental management (qem) -system according to iso 9001/14001 hapag-lloyd
component.status: serviceable condition must be improved. proper function may be jeopardized.
